title: Неизвестный солдат
overview: Неизвестный солдат "(Unknown Soldier") is a Soviet three-part television film. Filmed according to the story of the same name and script by Anatoly Rybakov, as a continuation of the television movie "Каникулы Кроша". The second film adaptation of the book after the film "Минута молчания" (Minute of Silence) (1971).
